origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'BondMarketAPI.get_yield_history', 'description': 'This function provides historical yield data for bonds of specified countries over a given duration.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'countries', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of countries for which to retrieve bond yield data.'}, {'name': 'duration', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The duration of the historical data, e.g., 1Y, 5Y, 10Y.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'yieldData', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the historical yield data for each country.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 BondMarketAPI.get_yield_history, 它的参数输入如下: 'countries'是['US', 'Germany', 'Japan'], 'duration'是'10Y'.
